instructions: Navigate to File > Open and select a file/directory to begin. Select a file (SWF) if you would like to curate a game. Select a directory full of SWF files if you would like AutoFPCurator to
iterateThrough: iterate through every Flash game in the folder. Or, you can select an existing curation folder to pick up where you left off.
notice: This tool is only designed FOR SINGLE ASSET GAMES that work in the Flash projector. Otherwise, please use Flashpoint Core.
